May we request for the following details:

•                    Bill of Lading or Airway Bill or Truck waybill as applicable

•                    Proof of delivery (if not claused, reason for not clausing)

Dear Supplier,

 

*	Please find the attached order/s and thanks to deliver to the store/s.
*	If there is any discontinued item found in the attached, please let us know urgently.
*	If barcode(s) in our PO do not match with what is expected or what appears physically on the product, please let us know urgently.

 

For deliveries to Sephora eComm, please ensure to follow the below steps:

 

*	Working days of ASN team is from Monday to Friday.
*	Bincy will create Drop ID on the same day if the request is received before 3.30pm and on the next day after 3.30pm.
*	The email should include the Invoice IN EXCEL and PDF (as attachment), along with the corresponding PO #, Packing List (PL), Gross Weight (GW) and details of the no. of cartons or pallets that the delivery represents.
*	Item Description, Barcode, QTY, Unit Price & Total Price are mandatory data to be mentioned on the invoice.
*	As soon as your Invoice is raised against our eComm PO, please email it to the below contacts:
